mapper.insert: insert into shopping_user(id, username, email, phone_number, password) values(shopping_user_seq.nextval, #{username}, #{email}, #{phone_number}, #{password})
mapper.update: update shopping_user set password = #{password} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into receiving_address(id, user_id, consignee, where_city, street_address, postal_code, phone_number) values(receiving_address_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{consignee}, #{whereCity}, #{streetAddress}, #{postalCode}, #{phoneNumber})
mapper.select: select r.id address_id, r.consignee address_consignee, v.id order_id, v.creation_time order_time, v.state order_state, v.payment_mode order_pay, v.quantity order_quantity, p.id product_id, p.price product_price from vip_orderlist v join receiving_address r on v.address_id = r.id join product p on v.product_id = p.id where v.user_id = #{userId}

select p.id product_id, p.order_number product_number, p.brand product_brand, p.model product_model, p.body_color product_color, p.price product_price, p.business product_business, r.id address_id, r.consignee address_consignee, r.phone_number address_phone, r.postal_code address_code, r.where_city address_city, r.street_address address_street, v.id order_id, v.payment_mode order_pay, v.state order_state, v.quantity order_quantity from vip_orderlist v join receiving_address r on v.address_id = r.id join product p on v.product_id = p.id where v.id = #{id}
